casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Napier Sandford FULLER 378P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 22, 2019 Napier Sandford Fuller, for Fuller, Napier Sandford. Peter A. Regulski, Assistant Attorney General, Blake M. Courlang, District Attorney, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*105The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of February 2019 by Defendant for an Emergency Injunction for ADA Title II Accommodations for a Court Appearance on 2/25/2019:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of February 2019."
